activities.title: Gresham Microfinance
activities.details: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice
